record.title: GENERAL LEAVE
record.narrative:
GENERAL LEAVE -- (House of Representatives - March 10, 2008)

[Page: H1432]

speaking.paragraph: Madam Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that all Members have 5 legislative days to revise and extend their remarks in the Record on the two concurrent resolutions just considered.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentlewoman from California?
